title: Long Shot (Curb Your Enthusiasm True Crime)
description:
On today's True Story, Tig and Cheryl delve into the short doc "Long Shot," about a Los Angeles man accused of murder. Plus, his case shares a surprising connection with a certain popular HBO comedy starring Cheryl Hines! Meanwhile, Tig tells a potentially emasculating story, and "Papa Grande" is either a name for a grandfather, or a chain of burrito restaurants! *this episode contains spoilers* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
